main_definition: To leave out or not to include; to disregard something when considering.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To omit from a list, group, or total
meanings_and_examples.example: When calculating the final price after discounts, taxes were excluded.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not to take into account; not considering something as part of a decision or action
meanings_and_examples.example: The analysis was based on sales figures for 2019, excluding the anomalous data from that month.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To differentiate by separating out a particular group or category
meanings_and_examples.example: In her survey of local businesses, she excluded those under six months old to focus on established companies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To not include as part of something; to leave out deliberately
meanings_and_examples.example: The invitation list was shortened by excluding certain individuals due to their recent controversial actions.
